item.title: Laravel Queues in Production
item.description: The Laravel queue and event system is one of the most powerful features of the framework and indispensable if you want to build a modern web application. The queue provides a performant means to run background tasks that don’t block your HTTP lifecycle, allowing you to serve up a responsive application to your customers. Typically, you would use the queue to send emails, collect metrics or generate reports, amongst a number of other tasks that are either time consuming, prone to failure or can be done in an asynchronous manner that don’t impede the user’s workflow.
